products.title: Sennheiser HD 800 S
products.information: Sennheiser HD 800 S su slušalice otvorenog tipa prepoznate po izvanrednom zvučnom prostoru i jasnoći. Nude audiofilsku izvedbu i odličnu udobnost, čineći ih vrhunskim izborom za zahtjevne slušatelje.

products.title: Audeze LCD-4
products.information: Audeze LCD-4 su vrhunske planarne magnetske slušalice koje pružaju neusporedivu detaljnost i razlučivost. Njihova visokokvalitetna izrada i premium materijali osiguravaju iznimnu reprodukciju zvuka, čineći ih omiljenim među audio entuzijastima i profesionalcima.

products.title: Focal Utopia
products.information: Focal's Utopia su otvorene referentne slušalice namijenjene audiofilima i ljubiteljima glazbe koji traže ništa osim najboljeg. S beryllium driverima, pružaju iznimnu dinamiku, preciznost i uronjeni doživljaj slušanja.

products.title: Beyerdynamic DT 1990 Pro
products.information: Beyerdynamic DT 1990 Pro su visokokvalitetne slušalice otvorenog tipa poznate po svom analitičkom zvučnom potpisu i iznimnoj kvaliteti izrade. S preciznom reprodukcijom zvuka, odličan su izbor za kritično slušanje i profesionalnu upotrebu.

products.title: Audeze LCD-X
products.information: Audeze LCD-X su planarne magnetske slušalice koje nude balansirani zvučni potpis i visoku izvedbu. S preciznom reprodukcijom zvuka i udobnim dizajnom, popularan su izbor među audiofilima i profesionalcima u studiju.

products.title: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
products.information: Bose QuietComfort 35 II su popularne bežične slušalice s tehnologijom za otklanjanje buke koje pružaju izvrsnu udobnost i odličnu kvalitetu zvuka. Njihova tehnologija za otklanjanje buke osigurava mirno iskustvo slušanja u svakom okruženju.

products.title: Audio-Technica ATH-M50x
products.information: Audio-Technica ATH-M50x su profesionalne monitore slušalice poznate po svojoj preciznoj reprodukciji zvuka i izdržljivosti. Omiljene su među tonskim inženjerima i glazbenicima zbog iznimne izvedbe i udobnosti.

products.title: Sony WH-1000XM4
products.information: Sony WH-1000XM4 su bežične slušalice s naprednom tehnologijom za otklanjanje buke za uronjeni kvalitet zvuka. Nude dugotrajnu bateriju i pametne značajke, čineći ih odličnim izborom za putovanja i svakodnevnu upotrebu.

products.title: Grado SR325e
products.information: Grado SR325e su otvorene slušalice poznate po svojem dinamičkom i snažnom zvučnom potpisu. S retro dizajnom i visokokvalitetnim materijalima pružaju jedinstveno iskustvo slušanja.

products.title: AKG K712 Pro
products.information: AKG K712 Pro su otvorene slušalice koje nude širok i uronjen zvučni prostor. Inženjerski su izrađene za precizno slušanje i audiofilsku kvalitetu zvuka.

products.title: Fostex TH-900 MK2
products.information: Fostex TH-900 MK2 su visokokvalitetne zatvorene slušalice koje pružaju luksuznu kvalitetu zvuka i premium izradu. Njihovi biodinamički driveri pružaju izvrsne detalje i razlučivost, čineći ih vrhunskim izborom za audiofile.

products.title: Meze Empyrean
products.information: Meze Empyrean su premium planarne magnetske slušalice poznate po svojoj prirodnoj i uključujućoj reprodukciji zvuka. Imaju jedinstveni hibridni dizajn drivera i visokokvalitetne materijale za iznimnu udobnost.

products.title: Shure SRH1540
products.information: Shure SRH1540 su zatvorene slušalice s naglaskom na bogat i dubok bas. Njihov lagani dizajn i premium jastučići od Alcantare osiguravaju udobnost tijekom dugih sesija slušanja.

products.title: Hifiman Sundara
products.information: Hifiman Sundara su otvorene planarne magnetske slušalice poznate po svojem detaljnom i balansiranom zvučnom potpisu. Nude izvrsnu jasnoću i razlučivost, što ih čini omiljenim izborom među audiofilima i kritičnim slušateljima.

products.title: Audeze LCD-2 Classic
products.information: Audeze LCD-2 Classic su planarne magnetske slušalice poznate po bogatom i toplom zvučnom potpisu. Nude glatku i prirodnu reprodukciju zvuka, čineći ih pogodnim za razne glazbene žanrove.

products.title: Schiit Magni 3+
products.information: The Schiit Magni 3+ is a versatile headphone amplifier that provides clean and powerful output for a wide range of headphones. Its simple and compact design, along with its budget-friendly price, makes it a popular choice among audio enthusiasts.

products.title: FiiO E10K
products.information: The FiiO E10K is an affordable DAC/Amp combo that offers improved audio quality for headphones and speakers. Its compact size and plug-and-play simplicity make it a great entry-level option for those looking to enhance their audio experience.

products.title: JDS Labs Atom
products.information: The JDS Labs Atom is a headphone amplifier that focuses on transparent and accurate sound reproduction. Its high-quality components and solid build ensure low distortion, making it an ideal choice for discerning listeners and audio professionals.

products.title: Audeze Deckard
products.information: The Audeze Deckard is a Class-A headphone amplifier with an integrated DAC, providing a high-quality audio experience. Its powerful and clean amplification is tailored to match Audeze headphones, delivering exceptional sound performance.

products.title: Sennheiser HDV 820
products.information: The Sennheiser HDV 820 is a high-end headphone amplifier designed to complement premium headphones. It offers a transparent and dynamic sound profile, making it an excellent choice for audiophiles who demand the best audio performance.

products.title: Chord Mojo
products.information: The Chord Mojo is a portable DAC/Amp that packs impressive audio performance in a small form factor. Its high-resolution sound and versatility make it a go-to choice for audiophiles on the move.

products.title: SPL Phonitor XE
products.information: The SPL Phonitor XE is a studio-quality headphone amplifier with Crossfeed technology for a speaker-like listening experience. It offers precise sound reproduction and a powerful headphone drive for professional use.

products.title: IFI Audio Pro iDSD
products.information: The IFI Audio Pro iDSD is a high-resolution DAC/Amp designed for audiophiles and music professionals. It offers a wide range of connectivity options and supports various audio formats.

products.title: Massdrop THX AAA 789
products.information: The Massdrop THX AAA 789 is a reference headphone amplifier designed with THX AAA technology for ultra-low distortion and high-fidelity audio. It is ideal for driving demanding headphones with precision and power.

products.title: RME ADI-2 DAC FS
products.information: The RME ADI-2 DAC FS is a versatile DAC/Amp that combines excellent audio performance with a wide range of features, including parametric EQ and crossfeed. It is well-suited for both audiophiles and professional audio engineers.
